document_data.mainbody:
ieutenant Nessfettle was an officer of the Neverwinter Guard that served the great city during the late 15 century DR.
She served under Captain Dunfield and had earned his trust as a reliable officer of the Guard.
Lieutenant Nessfettle led her soldiers into the city of Helms Hold during the citys siege in the . During the siege, they became overwhelmed by the Ashmadai and their devilish servitors and were forced to barricade themselves within an abandoned home. They endured ongoing attacks until a sergeant of the Guard broke through the Ashmadai forces, help Nessfettle and her men defend against a counterattack and finally head back out to the Last Redoubt camp with their lives.
